titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bis(4-t-butylcyclohexyl) Peroxydicarbonate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Bis(4-t-butylcyclohexyl) Peroxydicarbonate.
